website_summaries.verdict: Owners of smaller indoor or outside ferals will be very satisfied with it, but larger cats, may not take an interest. Expensive but worth the investment in exchange for years of use.
pros: Weatherproof construction makes it suitable for indoor and outdoor use
Designed with 2 escape doors to deter predators
Additional levels and sun decks allow for multiple cats
cons: Thin walls and lack of insulation may require the addition of an electric blanket

customer_reviews.title: WAY SMALLER THAN ADVERTISED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Description says 22x23x37 and actual dimensions are 16.5x14.75x35!!!! My cats still fit in it but it is a much tighter squeeze than I anticipated!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and DOG PROOF!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cats, a 10lb dog, and a much larger dog. We have ALWAYS had an issue of the dogs eating the cats food!!! Well, THIS IS A PERFECT SOLUTION!!! Although the small pup can fit into the bottom, she cannot climb the steps to get to the top where we can now feed the cats- notice the bowl in the pic. Door latches closed. GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not functional
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 cats to hide their litterbox and food from the dog. Even the smallest litter pan fits wrong in the base and my cats being adults miss it often. Scrubbing poop out of wood thats not stain resistant is a pain. The door came in with a broken latch which was so bent and twisted it couldn't be repaired. Maybe replaced. I'm going to try and make a pan that covers the whole base while protecting the wood, but I wouldn't recommend it for the purpose I intended it for. Maybe as a cute house for beds.. But not reallt anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Marie

customer_reviews.title: Damage - tools and time needed as well
customer_reviews.text: There were 4 places (2 outside and 2 inside) where the wood had been either dented, chipped or a chunk knocked out that had been glued back and painted over. The paint was close to the finish color, but not an exact match, therefore the damaged places were very obvious. Also, have the time and tools (I would suggest power tools) to put this together. It comes completely unassembled and there are approximately 26 screws that have to be installed. Yes, this is a cat house and no, they don't know the difference but I do. This was an expensive purchase in my opinion for feral cats and if I had to do it all over again I would not.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cain

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are off!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m only docking stars because the measurements were SO off. I got the three story blue cat home. It’s absolutely adorable. We put it in our living room but it’s definitely durable enough to go outside. Easy to put together with a power drill and extender bit. Maybe 40 minutes total? We have three cats and only two of them can use this. The measurements are way way off. Someone else posted the measurements, something like 17x16x32. Our poor fatty still doesn’t have a play house. Some of the paint dried dripping, but it’s not particularly noticeable. Overall, I’m impressed with ge quality. TLDR— cute, easy to put together, measurements are off so it’s no good for big kitties
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, but poorly packed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken piece on the roof (trim) and a gouge in the side from one of the large door hinges. It is also not well protected from the elements for an outside house, so we added several layers of spray polyurethane. The cutouts for the cats to go up and down inside are kind of small for larger cats. Very easy to assemble. and it does look nice. Cats enjoy going in and on top. we added some carpet inside to make it nicer. it does look exactly as pictured and the large door in the back is nice for cleaning or removing cats.
customer_reviews.author: The Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the porch
customer_reviews.text: I keep this under a covered porch that gets a good amount of rain blow in during storms and it has held up nicely. My cat likes the top shelf or sitting on the roof. It gives him a shelter if he's outside and it rains. The feet were a little challenging to screw into place. I did end up painting it another color and left the natural cedar on the inside. I would recommend this for a sheltered location only.
customer_reviews.author: MES

customer_reviews.title: Great cat house
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy cat house with good instructions to assemble. However, it is really too small for our two cats. They don’t use it much. They are not huge cats but they like to stretch out and this house doesn’t allow that. If you start out with kittens or younger cats, I’m sure they will like it. Very well made. We have it under a covered porch so not exposed to weather.
customer_reviews.author: THS 1965 Boy

customer_reviews.title: Its solid, just a little cramped.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together, roughly 30 minutes to assemble with basic hand tools, probably 15 or so with a screw gun. It's made of pine, so easy enough to assemble the soft wood. The internal dimensions are a bit small, and we are testing it with a 5 month old kitten. The top and bottom shelf/platform inside are rather small to have a cat get out of. I'll be removing the pieces and trimming accordingly. However, the cat does seem to thoroughly enjoy it. Not all that bad if you're willing to modify it slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Pins

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Snug and Secure
customer_reviews.text: We adopted four feral cats this summer, a mommy and three kittens and though the kittens are content to live indoors, the mama kitty prefers to live outdoors so we needed a proper shelter for her and this little house fits the bill perfectly . It will keep her warm, snug and safe from predators. My husband helped with the early phase of construction, holding up the sides but once they were secure, I was on my own and found the rest of assembly remarkably easy (I am woman hear me roar). We will proudly put Kiki's house on our front porch; we love wood crafts and this one couldn't be cuter!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Not good for hanging out, great for food storage.
customer_reviews.text: My two cats didn’t like hanging out in this. Don’t know why. I don’t know if it’s my cats and/or the design of this. One of my cats is small the other is huge. However! This thing did successfully end up being my cats’ outdoor dining room lol. I stored their food on the third floor and their water on the first floor. Kept their food and water out of the elements, dry and clean. They kept coming back to feed. So this worked great as a great place to keep their food and water outdoors. And I like how the food can go up on the third floor because that helps to keep other critters from getting at it.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute too small for regular inside cats
customer_reviews.text: I had to put the shelves in diffently to make them fit. The white one had an area cut out that did not line up with anything. Perfect for small cats. Outside cats not interested after a week I brought inside. But my regular size cat can not squeeze to the top. It's too small for regular size cats.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Connors

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice! Well built! Easy to assemble. Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This house is built for small cats! Mine are almost 20 pounds and hardly fit inside. They are fat, well-fed, American cats... Not danty french pussies!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Atzbach

customer_reviews.title: Great for ferrets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a play house for 3 ferrets. They love it. It's easy to put together. All you need is a screwdriver. They give you plenty of screws, but I wish that the picture diagrams were a little bigger. It took a minute to figure out which screws went where. One small piece of edging on the roof was broken during shipping. It's not that big of a deal and I turned it to where it's at the back. I will probably glue it back on. Overall it's a cute house.
customer_reviews.author: 4bella958

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cats won't really go in.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice on the porch and sort of gives the two neighborhood strays a place to hang out if the weather turns ugly. They both REFUSE to go in the flap entrance on the side. I don't know, if we remove the plastic, if they would go in or not. They will occasionally, if the doors are wide open, go in the center area. Other than that, they will only sit on top of it or hide behind it. It was easy to put together. I just wish the cats liked it more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ridenour

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pieces were damaged upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute cat house!! BUT.... the moment I pulled the pieces out of the box I noticed a piece of the roofing had been destroyed. Not sure if it was due to shipping and handling or if it is a manufacturers issue but it seems to be a common occurence based on the Amazon reviews. Nonetheless, it's a cute and sturdy house for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Neece

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat House, LOL!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if my outdood cats would take to something like this. Man was I surprised! Bought two outdoor heater pads and put it right on my back deck next to the back door. Got it just in time for frigid weather and snow. The back opens so I can change out towels and put fresh food and water. 3 stories so I can put food on bottom and the 2 cats can each have their own space, or if really cold cuddle up together. Very easy to assemble, and looks good next to the house. Side opening is too small for our local racoon to get into. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: David H. Gust

customer_reviews.title: Giving my cats nice roomy sleeping space without carpet.
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than you think. Wood extremely thin. Several holes marked wrong, but I figured it out. FEET IMPOSSIBLE TO PUT ON WITHOUT ELECTRIC DRILL. WANTED CAT HOUSE WITHOUT CARPET SO THEY WILL DO BUT WAIT TILL THEY ARE OB SALE OR YOU'LL BE DISAPPOINTED LIKE I WAS. DOUBT THEY WILL LAST THE WARRANTY. Turns out too small for adult cats to seriously play in.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good product, nothing to complain yet...
customer_reviews.text: The item was on a great sale, so we pulled the trigger. Assembly: <40 minutes for one person No issues; however, the bottom plastic feet are impossible to screw in because of poor design, unless you have a magnetic screwdriver. Instead, I used a heavy duty double-sided tape and it worked very well. Quality: Too early to say, but I am not sure if it will last for a long time, as it is is not solid wood. One of the inner shelves cracked when I was tightening the screw. The overall quality is Ikea-like. Overall: Easy access to inside, stable and hopefully our cat likes it. Will update the review over time.
customer_reviews.author: Pasha

customer_reviews.title: Just a little too small for me
customer_reviews.text: This could maybe have one more star. I don't know. Directions aren't great. Why not put "bottom" on the shelves to make it easy instead of staring at all angles of the pics. This is just smaller than i imagined so that is my fault. My kittens are 7 mos and too big I guess. They are not interested. Since i foster cats, i should get kittens this Spring and hopefully someone will use it. Looks cute. Not sure $99 is a great value since it's just not that big. If i had the time and energy to take apart and repack, I would have returned it for something larger.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Hazleton

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing! Super cute, durable, and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It's super cute, my kitty took to it right away and now has a warm safe place to sleep at night on our front porch. Easy to assemble, seems super durable and will probably last forever! The only tough part was trying to get the feet on the bottom of it, other than that was a really great buy.
customer_reviews.author: stev w.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens, but not big cats.
customer_reviews.text: Its a really cute house and pretty well made, however it's not for big or fat cats. Kittens and small cats wouldn't have a problem with it. I have a 15 lb large male and a fat regular size female there's no way they would ever fit into the openings in the shelves and the doors are kind of small. I really like it, and I think I can modify it for my fat and large cats and it will still be cute. So I recommend that if you have fat and or large cats, order one of the other houses they have. :)
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan deep freeze

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! looks just like the picture and was really simple to put together. took me about 20 minutes. would have taken less time if i would have remembered to charge my drill. the only complaint i would have would be that the plastic covering the door is a bit stiff but besides that it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra P

customer_reviews.title: Cute kitten house
customer_reviews.text: This little house looks very cute and it's easy to assemble. However I have to warn you that it's more fit for kittens. My bad for not checking the sizes of the little cat doors. Also don't do like me: don't force your scaredy cat into the house. She will hate it and months will pass until she will dare venture inside.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Popescu

customer_reviews.title: Looks great my cats don't like it
customer_reviews.text: Looks good easy to assemble but my two cats could care less for it, still sitting there I would be donating it or just get rid of it. Remember with cats each is different , try to make a small ball of Tim foil small enough to carry but not to swallow, you would see how they or he would play with it, and but a cat tree open , cats don't like the idea of feeling trap, which is what house would do. Again looks good not sure any cat would use it, mine do not
customer_reviews.author: rewreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: GREAT little house for the price. Our cat is 13 pounds, so we didn't put the large back door on, or the plastic flap, to make it easier for him to hang around in it. It's just inside, anyway. Seems very sturdy, not too hard to put together (and though I'm not the one who had to do it, I didn't hear any cursing while he was doing it!). SUPER cute. Exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: LOOK A HAPPY CAT
customer_reviews.text: I love this cat house and my cat too easy cleaning and perfect for my apartment thanks :-)
customer_reviews.author: BLACKHEARTT

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The cat didn't
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The cat didn't, but it gave me a place to put her food during the rainy season. She was a stray around my yard for about 8 months, but once she got friendly, I was able to find her microchip, and she's back home with her owners. I kept the house, because it's cute. Update: I agree this size is too small for an adult cat, but kittens might have fun in it. Oh, and the cat is back, it's raining, so I'm glad I kept it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary DIY

customer_reviews.title: Decent but broken and definitely not weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cute, kind of a lilac color not the blue pictured. The white trim on the back of the roof was off and snapped. Set up was easy. I did it all without a drill. Wouldn't recommend for outdoors unless under cover as the wood is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: This cat house is adorable. It is also made out of decent materials
customer_reviews.text: This cat house is adorable. It is also made out of decent materials, I mean it's not hardwood or anything, but it also isn't compressed garbage wood. Its just lightweight wood. The latches on the doors seem pretty secure. My 2 cats love it. I found them cuddled up together on the top floor the first night we had it. I also purchased a self warming mat to place in the house which makes it very cozy. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: This is a purrrrr-fect cat house. It is sturdy and well designed. It was easy to put together with my simple screw driver --all the pieces lined up accordingly. The only challenge was putting the feet on the base --the screws were small so it took a while to get the hang of it. But I did! And the cat house stands solidly and evenly --no wobble. My cat loves it! He enjoys exploring the different levels. It’s a comfortable place to call home😊
customer_reviews.author: scottchips

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but read the measurements
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped to use this as a "litter box". It's too small. Yes, the measurements are in the description. I am going to keep it to make a "cat condo". But, if you are looking for more.... don't.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Cat house
customer_reviews.text: Cat's love it. They are outside cats and I can put their food and water in the house out of the weather and out of reach of the dog.......... Construction appears to be good and sturdy, but have only had it for a few weeks, time will tell..............
customer_reviews.author: Brenda F.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Too small for average-sized cats (7 & 9 pounds). Very cute, though. Would be great for kittens and smaller cats. My 7-pounder climbs up the front, using the little windows for footholds, and sits on the roof. She loves it! Unfortunately, my larger cat cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Zink

customer_reviews.title: This cat house is adorable, but neither of my cats will use it
customer_reviews.text: This cat house is adorable, but neither of my cats will use it. I think it may be too small inside, even for my small cat. Also, I don't know if I put it together wrong, or if it's just not really designed to be outdoors, but the roof leaks. I would only recommend this if you know your cat likes small, confined spaces.
customer_reviews.author: ragdollk

customer_reviews.title: Needs reinforcement
customer_reviews.text: If I had purchased this for full price I would have sent it back as the workman ship was poor. As it was, I paid only $40 and took out my screwdriver, and wood glue and started making reinforcements. The design is very cute and if you don't mind doing some of the work that should have been done before then I would get it.
customer_reviews.author: Selkie

customer_reviews.title: Love the cat house
customer_reviews.text: Love the cat house! Well made and pretty blue wash color. The only down fall for me I had to return it because it was to small for my cat to climb around in. Trixie has other size but each cat house is different size, color, and shape. great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. But I've had it less than a year and it's falling apart. It is in the sun and rain but I figured it would last longet for the price. Also it's very small. My cats can only use one portion of it and they are small cats
customer_reviews.author: ToriGirl

customer_reviews.title: This is a very amazing and beautifully built cat home
customer_reviews.text: This is a very amazing and beautifully built cat home. it smells delicious too i believe its cedar wood?? Very easy to assemble. I have 5 cats and only two out of the 5 use it so far, am hoping the rest will learn to love it too. The only complain(which is why im giving it a 4 star) I have is that the inside "shelves" are too small cut. 3 of my cats are around 11-13 lb each and they dont fit in it, but it can be remedied if i cut it myself later on
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: almost like real shingles
customer_reviews.text: My cats fight over who gets the roof! the only drawback is the roofing materials are rough, almost like real shingles. I had to buy a small pad to put on top so the cats could get a good catnap in comfort. Not a draw back, but I wish the larger opening on the bottom was more towards the roof so both cats could see outside the window.
customer_reviews.author: Chigirl645

customer_reviews.title: I love it! So cute
customer_reviews.text: I love it! So cute.I painted it before assembling to be sure it was well weather proofed. Can't say my three cats are very impressed though. They will not go in. I have even put cat nip on the bedding. I also do not think it would be very warm in winter without some type of insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, not too hard to put together. (Moderately difficult but I'm 8 months pregnant) my cat doesn't like it yet, but hoping she will warm up to it. I couldn't put the four black things on the bottom but I'm using it for inside use so they aren't that necessary anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Amanda Mikhak

customer_reviews.title: Spend money on something else
customer_reviews.text: The wood is paper thin so it wouldn't keep a fly warm, nevermind a cat for colder climates, my cats don't even look at it let alone go into it, and its delicate. I've broken two pieces of trim off just by walking past it. If I could say anything good it would be its cute, and kids love it! Also pretty easy to put together besides the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Fairygirl

customer_reviews.title: a 2 level with a slightly better room would be better
customer_reviews.text: cat uses it - but the interior is too small. The decorative doors just make for allowing cold air in, and it has 3 levels.. a 2 level with a slightly better room would be better. For me - I got it dirt cheap (lower than I've seen it lately) so it's "good enough". My cat barely fits inside - he's a 9 lb male orange tabby.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Cat house
customer_reviews.text: Love it but it was not packages very well. It had some damage. The wood part on the roof came off & a piece of the wall got smashed into the handle . I just used wood glue to fix it. It also smelled really bad like pine, what it's made off, and paint. I had to air it out for two weeks outside. For the money it was great. The cats love it. It's really cute & real wood. I would give it 5 stars but it came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: angel angel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality, very cute.
customer_reviews.text: This little house is very well constructed. It's made from a soft pine that's easy to assemble. At first I was concerned about the size of the holes on each level being too small for my Maine coon mix it get through but she manages just fine. The roof of the house has actual asphalt singles tarred to it too. Instructions are easy to follow and the hardware comes nicely packaged in a way that makes it easy to see what part name each screw is.
customer_reviews.author: Katsumi

customer_reviews.title: My rabbits all love these and they last!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! My rabbits love them and they have lasted 8 months now. Anyone with rabbits knows they chew through everything. I expect these will last a long time given they're in great shape so far. They've been nibbled on but will last several years more if not forever. Love the back access to easily clean or pull out bunnies.
customer_reviews.author: Simon I.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy cat house. Just wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on another website that I thought was absolutely cute. Bought it so my cats can chill in it in our yard when they want to. The package came in flat, but was very easy to install, and looks sturdy! Too bad my cats are too fat, none of them would get through the doors or holes. They hangout on the roof though.
customer_reviews.author: CCCCalicyc

customer_reviews.title: Small Cat Heaven
customer_reviews.text: While this is a beautiful piece of cat furniture, I would only recommend it for kittens or very small cats. Our 8 and 10 pound adult cats appear to find it too confining. They have little or no interest in exploring it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Good but Small
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit smaller than I originally thought it was going to be. My cats love it though. I bought them pillows that I have to fold up the sides of the section because there aren't any smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and great for kittens once they get used to it. Mine gets wet on the lower level. I've had a possum get in it 3 diffferent times looking for something to eat. Would I buy this model again? Probably not. I think I would go with a different mode. I am a Senior Citizen and I assemblied it all by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Starseed23

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!!!! For kittens only!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable but neither of my cats could fit in it! Plus the wood gave me serious allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Jessfaber

customer_reviews.title: Need to make a little larger
customer_reviews.text: Little tight for average cat sizes my cats are fit and are not large cats this could use 4 more inches width and at least 6 more inches height wise. Disappointed there isn't a little more room. Can't fit small cat bed on shelf which is needed for outside in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Candance Kilbourne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble & well constructed !
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how easy this was to assemble. It’s made of real wood & all of the screw holes lined up well. My cat got right in it , she gives it 4 paws up.
customer_reviews.author: Callie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: 3-Story Cat's House Indoor/Outdoor
customer_reviews.text: I hope the cats like it as much as I do. I just received it today and put it together. Easy to assemble and attractive. I was so pleased with it that I ordered a 2nd one. Also Amazon's sent the item very quickly, It arrived before I expected to see it. So far, I am exceptionally happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable to look at but no renters yet
customer_reviews.text: This house is adorable and not too hard to assemble. But this house is made for small cats - I grow my cats BIG. I have had it outside for two weeks now. My outdoor feral cats (who I bought it for) have not paid it any attention to it at all. I may eventually move it indoors so my pet cats can have it - but I doubt they will fit :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Yarab

customer_reviews.title: Only for small cats
customer_reviews.text: The cat house is cute and made well but don't expect any good size cat to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cat codons
customer_reviews.text: This cat house is wonderful I am going to buy another one thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Toylene Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I think I paid more than it's worth. ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I think I paid more than it's worth. It's a cute little house for the outside cats but they're not very interested in it at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Francisco

customer_reviews.title: A lot better built than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: A lot better built than I was expecting . It went together very easy too. It took maybe 10 minutes to completely assembly. It does smell strongly of wood and paint right out of the box. That will turn off most cats from wanting to venture inside for a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Scott L

customer_reviews.title: good and bad
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as I expected. I had read all reviews here,good and bad. I took out my measuring tape to get a visual idea of the space inside. I did my homework. My 2 cats are less than 7lbs each so they will fit on the "shelves" inside. I just have to make them some blankies/pillows. Also, one thing that I didn't see in other reviews, is that the roof is made of stuff that cats like to scratch,so that's a plus. Overall, I felt it was decently made, semi-easy to put together and very adorable. We bought it for indoor kittys btw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just love it! Assembly was ok
customer_reviews.text: Just love it! Assembly was ok. It looks just like on the picture. Most importantly, it is absolutely dog proof!!! Our dog, like most dogs, prefers cat food and this house solved the problem. In addition, everybody who sees it compliments it and asks from where it is.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Bordyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design. I ordered it for my mom, who shelters stray cats in the winter. The doors and windows that open are a nice touch. Very simple to put together (about 15 minutes by myself). The shingle-roof should help with the whethering, and the oil-based gray paint (albeit a thin coat) should help its durability. There's no doubt the wood is thin, and I don't know how many years this will last especially in our harsh winters. But for the $90-some I paid for it, I'm happy. Also, be sure to note the dimensions. These are EXTERIOR dimension, including the roof overhang, front "porch" overhang, etc. In the end, the interior dimension are about 12"x12" on 3 separate floors.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kleinberg

customer_reviews.title: It looks awesome and im sure my cats will be using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received it today, it only took me an hour with a regular screw driver, if I had a power drill it would have taken so long. I do wish I had a magnetic end to the drill, putting the legs on were sorta compicated. It looks awesome and im sure my cats will be using it soon. Over all, I love it. Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Over all sturdy.  Not for fat cats.  Received broken
customer_reviews.text: I like the house burning recieved it with a couple broken parts I fixed one but the larchnon the back is broken off and was just laying in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Desda Casey

customer_reviews.title: We really like it. And it really was not difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: We are using it for a stray cat we are caring for. She loves it. It keeps her dry and safe. It's also just so cute. We really like it. And it really was not difficult to put together. It took us awhile because we are not very handy with tools. But it was very easy with two people. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cut cat house
customer_reviews.text: A bit small for my 14lb cat to move around in but its made out of nice cedar wood and looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Mom

customer_reviews.title: I have an indoor enclosure where they live but anyone who knows feral cats knows they like to stay to themselves most of the tim
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my feral cats. I have an indoor enclosure where they live but anyone who knows feral cats knows they like to stay to themselves most of the time. I now have picked up a second one. It is real wood, relatively easy to put together. I thought it seemed a little flimsy but it has proven me wrong. The first one has been in use for a bout a year and a half and I do mean in use, hard use and other than a couple of the roof moldings falling off it has been great. As Grampz is telling me in the picture , " get out of my yard !"
customer_reviews.author: Woody T Hecat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Has a strong cedar scent, that at first was a bit overpowering. If you're sensitive to cedar, put it together outside. Sturdy and adorable. I have indoor kitties who play in it outside. I screened in the doorways and they love t.
customer_reviews.author: SageMommy

customer_reviews.title: Not for a large cat
customer_reviews.text: Not really large enough for your average cat. My kitty is smaller than normal so she fits just fine. Spends most of her time on the roof though.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent house for your cat!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, and my cat loves it. The middle shelf didn't fit, however, and it needed to be sanded down. Other than that, I am very pleased with the cat house!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Kittens could have a bit of fun in it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but way too small for my cat to get in it. She isn't even a large cat (about 8 lbs). Kittens could have a bit of fun in it, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: SapphireMoon

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This house is very cute but it is way to small for an average size adult cat. I foster kittens and it will be good for them but my adult cats can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: MitchyVon

customer_reviews.title: Cute.. but little things
customer_reviews.text: It's cute.. sharp edges on inside, latches on back door doesn't work I installed new ones. The roof sheds everywhere. But I put a carpet in it and sanded down edges and it's extremely cute. Will smell up the house like pine for several days. Overall cute.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Fun cat house
customer_reviews.text: My kitties have so much fun with this house Yes, a big pussy cat has a hard time trying to utilize all three floors but mine will play with the little ones through the windows
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!
customer_reviews.text: This house is tiny! It's very cute and easy to assemble but much too small for even a small cat.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Yamada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 outside cats that needed a place to sleep. Since I put the house outside they recognized as their own and are not using my furniture anymore. Even though the house is not as a great quality as I expected, it fills my cats needs.
customer_reviews.author: Gi Ramos

customer_reviews.title: I loved it Cats didn't
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic house I wanted to keep it and tried everything to get my cats to use it but they just weren't interested but if you looking for a cathouse this is adorable and very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Morganfmoms

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Got this cat house for the outdoor feral cats that my family's been taking care of. The built time took about ak hour or so. It stays outside and we put blankets inside on the top level. The House has three levels. It's great for the three cats. It took some time for the cats to get use to it. But its great they love it and it looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRIXIE 3 STORY CAT HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cat house! My cat loves it too. Although we had to remove the door flaps because she was afraid of them. Once she has adjusted we will put them back on. The house is the perfect size to put her outdoor animal heating pad in as well. This product is beautiful and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L.

customer_reviews.title: Well made nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Well made very nice looking my husband had an easy time putting it together. My cats are using it. It's very cute!
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality house
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality house, but I liked it more than my cats, unfortunately. It is easy to assemble. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: J. Graham

customer_reviews.title: but perfect for kittens
customer_reviews.text: A little small for a grown cat, but perfect for kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Poplin

customer_reviews.title: good for price
customer_reviews.text: Put together pretty quickly! My poor gus is on the heavier side and just barely fits. But he loves it so far! You will need a drill.
customer_reviews.author: jessa

customer_reviews.title: It’s not built for cats over 10-11 pounds to fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: The size isn’t exactly what we expected. It’s not built for cats over 10-11 pounds to fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: this was great --- it took my cat a while to enjoy ...
customer_reviews.text: this was great --- it took my cat a while to enjoy it --- but now she likes it --- good construction -- I added a piece of carpet on all the levels she liked it even more
customer_reviews.author: JUDI

customer_reviews.title: Cat House
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love this little house and it looks cute on my porch!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but my cats haven't started using it much ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, but my cats haven't started using it much yet. The weather became extremely cold, so they just hid out in my house, near the fire.
customer_reviews.author: TechGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea But my cat hates it and too big ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea But my cat hates it and too big to have it hang around unused. So I guess I'm going to donate to someone who looks out for stray cats or give it to a shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Napolitano

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and our outdoor cat used it right away. Also, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M Nix

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!! It was easy to assemble and it looks super cute outside my front door :-) The kitties seem to like it, as well :-)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but tight interior wasn't welcoming for the furry ones.
customer_reviews.text: So I really like this. It's unique, well built, and easy to put together. However, it is small, which I was expecting, but the inside spacing was smaller than I was expecting. My cats are not huge, but it wasn't a place they were willing to hide which I think was due to the tight interior. I've included pictures of the house (check the window kitty is peeking) and one kitty laying in the dogs bed to show you her size. Sadly I ended up returning this house due to the size.
customer_reviews.author: CMP

customer_reviews.title: Small and well made
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but it is small (which is what we were looking for, but maybe slightly too small). Very efficient and good design though.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably houses 6 cats during the winter months
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these, fused together at the back doors with an added roof. Comfortably houses 6 cats during the winter months. Purrfect!
customer_reviews.author: kenalexruss

customer_reviews.title: Cute not really big as you think, the cats ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute not really big as you think, the cats can't lay on the shelves not big enough. We use it as a place to hid the dry food from the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Tyree

customer_reviews.title: For small cats its great.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but inside shelves are too small for adult cat to lay on, more for kittens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to build and adorable outside. Unfortunately, my stray doesn't like the small space, so it is now used as garden decor.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking house and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It took some coaxing but she is working her way into sleeping in there. Really nice looking house and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I added two headed pads and my outdoor feral cats love this house. This will be the second year outside and it’s holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: THE BEST

customer_reviews.title: Parts not labeled!
customer_reviews.text: The house is very sturdy! Assembly would have been a lot easier if the parts were labeled! Finally got things figured out and the cats love it!
customer_reviews.author: robert sanne

product_meta.title: Trixie 3-Story Cat Home Playground
product_meta.description: Size:22 x 23 x 37 in.Trixie's 3-Story Cat's Home provides your feline with a secure and relaxed environment that can be used both indoors and out. Being crafted with solid pine construction, durable composite shingles, weatherproof finish and the finest materials means this cat house will endure years of use with very little maintenance. Cats can come and go using the front door on the 2nd floor or the side door on the 1st floor which has a slatted plastic flaps to keep out unwanted wind and rain. There is also a large door at the back for quick access and easy maintenance. Once inside, they can climb, crawl, jump and explore between the three levels. The charming latched shutters plus two peek-a-boo holes are sure to entertain even the most playful feline. When it's time for a catnap, your kitty can curl up on one of the lounging decks for a nap in the sun. The elevated foundation promotes air circulation and protects your cat from ground chill and wet conditions, while the hard plastic footing prevents decay due to wet soil. Suitable for cats of all ages and activity levels. Quick and easy assembly. One year warranty. Color: sky blue/white. Dimensions: 22 x 23 x 37 Inch. Weight: 30 lbs.
feature_bullets: 3-story wooden cat house with weatherproof finish
Charming hinged shutters and peek a boo holes
2 kitty doors and 1 large hinged door at back for easy maintenance
Slatted plastic flaps in side door keep out wind and rain
Raised floor allows air to circulate keeping the floor dry and comfortable

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
